properties.name: jwt.issuer
properties.description: Used to configure the issuer that will be set on all JWTs generated by the server.

properties.name: jwt.secret.key
properties.description: Used to configure the key used to sign all JWTs generated by the server.

properties.name: swagger.description
properties.description: A description for the client application, displayed on the Swagger UI. This is required to use this library's built-in Swagger configuration.

properties.name: swagger.title
properties.description: The title of client application, displayed on the Swagger UI. This is required to use this library's built-in Swagger configuration.
